title: Are the Odds of Getting a Gemstone Different Between the Legacy and Worlds Orbs?
body:
I'm really shooting for a Neo Pax Sivir, and was wondering if my chances of getting those last couple gemstones are different between the two orbs.

Thanks

replies.body: I don't actually believe either orb has a higher drop rate, the main difference is that the Legacy Orb should only drop Legacy Skins.
That would be inconsistent with findings from previous events.
